title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Jason Whitlock & Lori Meyers | 4/14/21
description:
Distribution of Johnson & Johnson’s COVID-19 vaccine has been paused, but should it have been? The Supreme Court is ruling in favor of religious freedom, and the Left isn’t happy. Journalist Jason Whitlock returns to describe his time in "Twitter jail." Lori Meyers, co-founder of Educators for Quality and Equality, joins to share her insight on critical race theory as it spreads even into math classes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
